column4: i am trying to play movies in totem... i am a newbie... i installed the codecs it said I needed. but only way to see anything is full screen and sometimes squares block out part of the image... and have to switch it back and forth a few times too... or it shall only be a blank screen
sounds like you are running with beryl/compiz i guess?
i have no idea about beryl or compiz..  i just installed edubuntu today...  my windows hard drive crashed.  so I wanted to reload anyways so finally felt today was a good day to go linux...
ok. without having any details i would guess that you have a problem with your video driver. what video card do you have?
